inclusion.criterion: Mitral valve prolapse diagnosed in echocardiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No contraindication to MRI or exercise ECG
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mitral valve prolapse with severe regurgitation and instable hemodynamic state
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior MRI with contrast within the last month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior diagnosis of primary cardiomyopathy potentially responsible for myocardial fibrosis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to exercise ECG: severe handicap, poor physical capacity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to MRI: implantable device, claustrophobia, metal debris
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal insufficiency with creatinine clearance <30 ml/min or prior serious side effect related to infusion of a magnetic contrast agent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is prepared to undergo surgery. EF of 65% on TTE.
